abstract: The announcement appeared to be an abrupt reversal for the country's Sunni monarchy, which had appeared intent on dealing severely with protesters.
snippet: The announcement appeared to be an abrupt reversal for the country's Sunni monarchy, which had appeared intent on dealing severely with protesters.
lead_paragraph: The government of Bahrain said on Wednesday that it would hold new trials for medical personnel sentenced to harsh prison terms by a special security court last week, the Bahrain News Agency reported.

headline.main: Bahrain Orders New Trials for Medical Workers
